content.prompt: At the Great Mosque (Masjid-e Jameh) at Isfahan, Iran, the qibla iwan reminds worshippers to direct themselves toward the city of Mecca as they pray through the presence of

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.2: Purpose and Audience in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
